price: Wancan ne, dõmin lalle ne sũ, sunã sãɓa wa Allah da ManzonSa. Kuma wanda ya sãɓa wa Allah da ManzonSa, to, lalle ne Allah Mai tsananin uƙũba ne.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمۡ شَآقُّواْ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥۚ وَمَن يُشَاقِقِ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ شَدِيدُ ٱلۡعِقَابِ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: dhālika bi-annahum shāqqū al-laha warasūlahu waman yushāqiqi al-laha warasūlahu fa-inna al-laha shadīdu al-ʿiqābi
